method.name: SendStandByToAllDevices
method.tp:docstring:
Attempt to put all HDMI CEC compatible devices in stand-by.
This is not guaranteed to have any effect on the connected displays. Displays that do not support HDMI CEC will not be affected.

method.name: SendWakeUpToAllDevices
method.tp:docstring:
Attempt to wake the display and announce ourselves as active source.
This will attempt to wake up displays (by sending “Image View On” request) and announce this device as the active input source towards all HDMI CEC enabled displays connected.
